languages.text: "К несчастью, сейчас там обосновался Злоба со своими Ревущими. Он выгнал нас из этого укрытия, потому придется нанести ему визит и расправиться с ним. Предлагаю тебе нанести первый внезапный удар, а мы поддержим атаку снаружи".

"Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."
languages.original_text: "К несчастью, сейчас там обосновался Злоба со своими Ревущими. Он выгнал нас из этого укрытия, потому придется нанести ему визит и расправиться с ним. Предлагаю тебе нанести первый внезапный удар, а мы поддержим атаку снаружи".

traits.locale_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

"Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

"Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

"Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

"Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

languages.text: “但遗憾的是，恶棍与他的尖啸者打败了我们，占领了基地。因此，我们的首要任务是对付这群敌人。我建议你发起奇袭，对他进行第一轮打击，我们会从外部来支援你们的攻击。”
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: “但遗憾的是，恶棍与他的尖啸者打败了我们，占领了基地。因此，我们的首要任务是对付这群敌人。我建议你发起奇袭，对他进行第一轮打击，我们会从外部来支援你们的攻击。”

languages.text: 「残念ながら、マリスと奴のシュリーカーが我々を追い出し、基地を占拠されてしまったので、到着したらまずは奴らと対峙しなければなりません。あなたたちは奇襲を仕掛けて先制攻撃したほうがよいでしょう。我々は外から援護します」
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、マリスと奴のシュリーカーが我々を追い出し、基地を占拠されてしまったので、到着したらまずは奴らと対峙しなければなりません。あなたたちは奇襲を仕掛けて先制攻撃したほうがよいでしょう。我々は外から援護します」

languages.text: «Por desgracia, Malicia y sus Aulladores nos expulsaron y se hicieron con la base, de modo que nuestro primer objetivo es enfrentarnos a ellos. Recomiendo que le ataque por sorpresa y aseste el primer golpe; nosotros le apoyaremos desde el exterior».
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, Malicia y sus Aulladores nos expulsaron y se hicieron con la base, de modo que nuestro primer objetivo es enfrentarnos a ellos. Recomiendo que le ataque por sorpresa y aseste el primer golpe; nosotros le apoyaremos desde el exterior».

languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, Démon et ses Hurleurs nous ont chassé de la base et occupent maintenant les lieux, ce qui veut dire que nous allons donc devoir les affronter pour regagner le portail. Je suggère que vous frappiez en premier pour le prendre par surprise, et nous, nous vous soutiendrons de l'extérieur. »
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, Démon et ses Hurleurs nous ont chassé de la base et occupent maintenant les lieux, ce qui veut dire que nous allons donc devoir les affronter pour regagner le portail. Je suggère que vous frappiez en premier pour le prendre par surprise, et nous, nous vous soutiendrons de l'extérieur. »

languages.text: "Leider haben Tücke und seine Kreischer uns vertrieben und die Basis übernommen, also wird die erste Aufgabe sein, ihn dort zu stellen. Ich schlage vor, Ihr überrascht ihn und führt den ersten Schlag – wir unterstützen den Angriff von außen."
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Leider haben Tücke und seine Kreischer uns vertrieben und die Basis übernommen, also wird die erste Aufgabe sein, ihn dort zu stellen. Ich schlage vor, Ihr überrascht ihn und führt den ersten Schlag – wir unterstützen den Angriff von außen."

languages.text: "Maalesef ki Melanet ve Çığırtkanlar bizi kovalayıp üssü ele geçirdi. Bu yüzden yapacağımız ilk şey, onunla orada yüzleşmek olacak. Bence onu şaşırtıp ilk darbeyi sen vurmalısın, biz de saldırıyı dışarıdan destekleriz."
languages.original_text: "Regrettably, Malice and his Shriekers drove us out and took over the base, so the first order of business will be to confront him there. I propose that you take him by surprise and deliver the first strike — we will support the attack from the outside."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef ki Melanet ve Çığırtkanlar bizi kovalayıp üssü ele geçirdi. Bu yüzden yapacağımız ilk şey, onunla orada yüzleşmek olacak. Bence onu şaşırtıp ilk darbeyi sen vurmalısın, biz de saldırıyı dışarıdan destekleriz."
